name: git-branch-on-release-task
description: Branch artifacts source during release with ReleaseName.
author: Michael Barry

inputs.name: branchFolder
inputs.label: Branch Folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: The folder to branch into: /refs/heads/(branchFolder)/(regexed releaseName)

inputs.name: searchRegex
inputs.label: Search Regex
inputs.helpMarkDown: The regex to select replacement values. Default is: \s+

inputs.name: regexFlags
inputs.label: Regex Flags
inputs.helpMarkDown: The flags to the regex. Default is: g

inputs.name: replacePattern
inputs.label: Replacement Pattern
inputs.helpMarkDown: The replacement patten corresponding to the regex above. Default is empty string
